What is the significance of the VYAWN mo: It is a known neutralizing epitope targeted by VH114.
It is a novel epitope targeted by VH278.

What potential advantage do nanobodies h: They lack Fc regions, reducing the risk of ADE via Fc receptor-mediated pathways.
They have a longer half-life, increasing their effectiveness.
They can be easily modified to enhance their binding affinity.
They are less expensive to produce, making them more accessible.
